sourceMeaningMnemonic: On the <radical>roof</radical> is your <radical>heart</radical>. OR! In a <radical>net</radical> in the <radical>street</radical>. Which would you <kanji>rather</kanji>?
meaningInfo: Would you rather have your heart up on the roof, close to falling but out of the way of people. Or would you rather have your heart in a net, which people can't steal from, but is in the way of cars.
readingMnemonic: As you try to decide which you'd <kanji>rather</kanji> have, your <reading>neigh</reading>bors (<ja>ねい</ja>) come out and grab the heart out of your hands.
readingInfo: "I'd rather you didn't have that!" you shout as your neighbors run through the neighborhood to their own house. You'd rather this wasn't happening! You'd rather your neighbors let you make your own choice!!
